feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [typo3/cms] TYPO3 Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the typoLink function in TYPO3 6.2.x before 6.2.16 and 7.x before 7.6.1 allows remote authenticated editors to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a link field.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2015-8759
  • https://github.com/TYPO3/typo3/commit/25a1473907f0f4b2bb0147c661981940c57a4555
  • https://github.com/TYPO3/typo3/commit/de1755a6dcff9b037c6d5a1fa340ba100aff054a
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-core-sa-2015-012
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20200228051548/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/79250
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-j5v7-9xr5-m7gx

entry.title: [typo3/cms] TYPO3 CMS indexed search Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the search result view in the Indexed Search (indexed_search) component in TYPO3 6.2.x before 6.2.16 allows remote authenticated editors to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2015-8756
  • https://github.com/TYPO3/typo3/commit/7e4bdf48988191043a65880c72190c4130c1f0e0
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-core-sa-2015-015
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20160624215319/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1034486
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xx7m-8rq2-cw2v

entry.title: [typo3/cms] TYPO3 allows remote attackers to embed Flash videos from external domain
entry.content:
The Flvplayer component in TYPO3 6.2.x before 6.2.16 allows remote attackers to embed Flash videos from external domains via unspecified vectors, aka "Cross-Site Flashing."

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2015-8760
  • https://github.com/TYPO3/typo3/commit/29ae05c04cb48d4031d323f17d8f2b68b27af353
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-core-sa-2015-014
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20160621232021/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/79210
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20161012163613/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1034485
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-3f58-74qw-ph75

entry.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin allows remote attackers to spoof content via the url parameter
entry.content:
The redirection feature in url.php in phpMyAdmin 4.4.x before 4.4.15.1 and 4.5.x before 4.5.1 allows remote attackers to spoof content via the url parameter.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2015-7873
  • https://github.com/phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin/commit/cd097656758f981f80fb9029c7d6b4294582b706
  • http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2015-November/171311.html
  • http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2015-November/171326.html
  • http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2015-October/169987.html
  • http://www.debian.org/security/2015/dsa-3382
  • https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2015-5
  • https://github.com/phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin/commit/2b31866fe0b30b867aaf5b5fedb11adb354e037f
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20161014120907/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1034013
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20200228052850/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/77299
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5pmg-qh2c-7j24

entry.title: [concrete5/concrete5] concrete5 vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in concrete5 before 5.7.4 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to private messages or other unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2015-3989
  • https://documentation.concretecms.org/developers/introduction/version-history/5-7-4-release-notes
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20200228094356/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/74699
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jxhp-rwqv-9fjj

entry.title: [vertexvaar/falsftp] fal_sftp extension for TYPO3 uses weak permissions for sFTP driver files and folders
entry.content:
The fal_sftp extension before 0.2.6 for TYPO3 uses weak permissions for sFTP driver files and folders, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-8327
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/97668
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/fal_sftp
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2014-014
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xwq4-2cwr-fv2q

entry.title: [co-stack/fal_sftp] fal_sftp extension for TYPO3 uses weak permissions for sFTP driver files and folders
entry.content:

entry.title: [punktde/pt_extbase] yag and pt_extbase extensions for TYPO3 allow remote attackers to bypass access restrictions
entry.content:
The Ajax dispatcher for Extbase in the Yet Another Gallery (yag) extension before 3.0.1 and Tools for Extbase development (pt_extbase) extension before 1.5.1 allows remote attackers to bypass access restrictions and execute arbitrary controller actions via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-6289
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/pt_extbase
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/yag
  • https://github.com/YAG-Gallery/yag/commit/4ab6ca121044d31b3822ab0c922053a9de8ee4ef
  • https://github.com/punktDe/pt_extbase/commit/9969635830fcf5c3222de0fd9dc0d9a05f8d6cb1
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2014-005
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-46fq-683f-2jwq

entry.title: [jbartels/wec-map] WEC Map (wec_map) extension for TYPO3 allows SQL Injection
entry.content:
SQL injection vulnerability in the WEC Map (wec_map) extension before 3.0.3 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-6295
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/wec_map
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2014-002
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f3v6-g4mv-pjhq

entry.title: [web-tp3/wec_map] WEC Map (wec_map) extension for TYPO3 allows SQL Injection
entry.content:
SQL injection vulnerability in the WEC Map (wec_map) extension before 3.0.3 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-6295

entry.title: [jbartels/wec-map] WEC Map (wec_map) extension for TYPO3 allows Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the WEC Map (wec_map) extension before 3.0.3 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-6296
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/wec_map
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2014-002
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mqhg-c7w9-w3cv

entry.title: [in2code/powermail] TYPO3 powermail extension allows remote attackers to bypass CAPTCHA protection mechanism
entry.content:
The powermail extension 2.x before 2.0.11 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to bypass the CAPTCHA protection mechanism via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-6288
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/powermail
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2014-006
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2jq7-pgqq-gqqj

entry.title: [in2code/femanager] TYPO3 femanager extension allows remote frontend users to modify or delete records of other frontend users
entry.content:
The femanager extension before 1.0.9 for TYPO3 allows remote frontend users to modify or delete the records of other frontend users via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-6292
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/femanager
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2014-002
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-377v-8637-6vq6

entry.title: [in2code/powermail] TYPO3 powermail extension has unrestricted file upload vulnerability
entry.content:
Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the powermail extension before 1.6.11 and 2.x before 2.0.14 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with a crafted extension, then accessing it via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-3947
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/powermail
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2014-007
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-m278-c6gg-4jrr

entry.title: [in2code/powermail] TYPO3 powermail extension has unrestricted file upload vulnerability
entry.content:
Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the powermail extension before 1.6.11 and 2.x before 2.0.14 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with a crafted extension, then accessing it via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2014-3947
  • http://typo3.org/extensions/repository/view/powermail
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2014-007
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-m278-c6gg-4jrr

entry.title: [geshi/geshi] GeSHi vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in contrib/langwiz.php in GeSHi before 1.0.8.11 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2012-3522
  • http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2012/08/21/11
  • http://sourceforge.net/p/geshi/code/2508
  • https://lists.fedorahosted.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/AE33KOZ42XXG6DSH5SNGOTC3NS7FWZ2I
  • https://lists.fedorahosted.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/H2R65LEAIDK6I53IYGZWDCRETBYKNUKF
  • https://lists.fedorahosted.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/JA5TA3T7AJXWM4QMI62LMGW62WZUULGB
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f3f3-5q5j-6v47
